scripts.name: Dex Explorer v5
scripts.description: Roblox Studio explorer but locally in game.
scripts.script: loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zzerexx/Dex/refs/heads/master/main.lua'))();local m=game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse();local ma=game.CoreGui:WaitForChild('MainMenu').OpenButton.MainFrame.AppsFrame.Container;for _,g in pairs(ma:GetChildren())do if g.Name=='App'and g.Main.Icon.ImageRectOffset==Vector2.new(96,0)then g:Destroy()end end local c=game.CoreGui.MainMenu.OpenButton.MainFrame.AppsFrame.Container local n=c.App:Clone()n.Parent=c local e=false n.Main.AppName.Text='Part Lookup'n.Main.Icon.ImageRectOffset=Vector2.new(96,0)n.Main.Icon.ImageRectSize=Vector2.new(32,32)local function s()n.Main.BackgroundColor3=e and Color3.fromRGB(60,60,60)or Color3.fromRGB(45,45,45)n.Main.Highlight.Visible=e end s()n.Main.MouseEnter:Connect(function()n.Main.BackgroundColor3=Color3.fromRGB(65,65,65)end)n.Main.MouseLeave:Connect(s)n.Main.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function()e=not e s()end)game:GetService('UserInputService').InputBegan:Connect(function(i,p)if not p and e and i.UserInputType==Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then print(m.Target:GetFullName())end end)

scripts.name: Infinite Yield
scripts.description: Best universal script out there. Best one, no cap.

scripts.name: BABFT Auto Farm
scripts.description: Simple auto farm that cna be toggled ON/OFF via a button
scripts.script: local Players=game:GetService('Players');local p=Players.LocalPlayer;local dir=workspace.BoatStages.NormalStages;local name='CaveStage';local stages=10;local timeDelay=2;local autofarm=false;local stage=0;local running=false;local character,hrp;local gui=Instance.new('ScreenGui');gui.ResetOnSpawn=false;gui.Parent=p.PlayerGui;local button=Instance.new('TextButton');button.Parent=gui;button.Text='Auto Farm: OFF';button.BackgroundColor3=Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0);button.Position=UDim2.new(0.01,0,0.01,0);button.Size=UDim2.new(0.08,0,0.05,0);local holder=Instance.new('Part');holder.Anchored=true;holder.CanCollide=true;holder.Size=Vector3.new(10,1,10);holder.Transparency=1;holder.Parent=workspace;local function setCharacter(char) character=char;hrp=char:WaitForChild('HumanoidRootPart') end;local function startFarm() if running or not autofarm then return end;running=true;stage=0;while autofarm do if not character or not hrp or not hrp.Parent then break end;stage+=1;if stage>stages then hrp.Anchored=true;character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(dir.TheEnd.GoldenChest.Trigger.CFrame);hrp.Anchored=false;break end;local stagePart=dir:WaitForChild(name..stage).DarknessPart;local cf=stagePart.CFrame+Vector3.new(0,-10,0);hrp.Anchored=true;holder.CFrame=cf;character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(cf);hrp.Anchored=false;task.wait(timeDelay) end;running=false end;button.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() autofarm=not autofarm;if autofarm then button.Text='Auto Farm: ON';button.BackgroundColor3=Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0);startFarm() else button.Text='Auto Farm: OFF';button.BackgroundColor3=Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0);if hrp then hrp.Anchored=false end end end);p.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(char) setCharacter(char);running=false;if autofarm then task.wait(0.25);startFarm() end end);if p.Character then setCharacter(p.Character) end
